actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to add 682.4 acres to Valley Forge National Historical Park, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Changes the map which depicts the area of the Valley Forge National Historical Park in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and increases the authorization ceiling to carry out the purposes of the act under which the Park was established.

titles.title: A bill to add 682.4 acres to Valley Forge National Historical Park, Pennsylvania.
